summary: Remesh/retexture for the Enchanter's table. Now adds various effects such as particles and smokes.
descriptionHtml:
[center][/center][center]
[size=3]This mod is a Remesh/retex for the [u][i]Enchanter's Worktable[/i][/u], [u][i]Work Station[/i][/u], & [u][i]Loadscreen Art.[/i][/u][/size]

[b]Video features & reviews: My thanks to xBonderx, hodilton, & BDMods[/b]
[youtube]ZDvmpdh9ZCs[/youtube]
[youtube]VPrakm0tC0A[/youtube][youtube]pdeKz9sah9c[/youtube]

Replacer that has hi-res glowmaps and de-noised and detailed vanilla textures, particle effects such as smoke and dust, and a molten fluid flow theme.
Lightened the darkwood texture of the vanilla one and revealed the wood texture. Work station texture features a texture with [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/images/34444-1-1365241338.jpg]removed beveled veins[/url] as I personally think the vanilla workstation one did not make sense.
[/center][size=3][b]Special Notes:[/b][/size]
Some of textures for this mod are uncompressed and is in the format of A8R8B8G8/32 Bits Per Pixel and is this was done for a reason as when compressed to other formats such as DXT1 and DXT5 the molten lava look on objects such as hardwood generates a lot of noise thus when saving in compressed formats, it's just the glowmaps look a lot smoother and less contricted and saturated with noise.

[size=3][b]Installing:[/b][/size]
Choose a replacer from a directory and copy the "Data\" folder provided in the archive to your
Skyrim\Data directory.

Overwrite any other files when prompted.

[size=3][b]Uninstalling:[/b][/size]
Trace back to the contents of the archive and delete what you have previously added to your Skyrim\Data directory.
author: jeclxohko
